segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, polishing a plate with meticulous care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling over the edge of the sink, creating a small puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to notice the chaos around her, completely absorbed in the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she doesn’t feel her foot getting soaked!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world through the window looks so peaceful and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, everything feels like a ticking time bomb of accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost funny how the kids are sneaking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR
